Load monitoring Products & Systems

Accurate and reliable load cells, load pins and other monitoring systems to ensure safety and efficiency of your assests.

ProductsSystemsParent Company

Whatever Sector your business is in we have the right product solutions for you 

Industrial | Marine | Mechanical Handling | Aerospace | Petrochemical

Load Cells

Compression, Tension, Pancake, Low Profile, Wired/Wireless high accuracy, various capacity load cells for standard or Ex applications

Find Out More
Load Pins

We offer a standard range of load pins, covering ratings between 500kgs to 1500 tonnes, however, the nature of this type of product means that most load pins are manufactured to meet each customers specific dimensional requirements.

Find Out More
Torque Transducers

Imes have a long history in the supply of specialist and bespoke measurement sensors such as load, torque, position, angle for a range of industries. These are often none standard design, arduous duty, extreme accuracy or for specialist applications. Imes range of bespoke Torque transducers and systems are no exception

Find Out More
Wireless Range

Our wireless range of load links and shackles can transmit on various frequencies from 434mHz to 2.4Ghz to standard handheld units or our bespoke monitoring SCADA software.

Find Out More
Line Tension Meters

Designed for new and retrofit winch and crane applications IMES LTM enables Line tension, line speed and payout monitoring.

Find Out More
Full Monitoring Systems

Imes offers full monitoring system packages for asset integrity. Bespoke software designed to communicate with all our load measurement devices using common protocols.

Find Out More

Complete process / Load monitoring  systems 

Imes International have a proven track record of developing full process control & monitoring systems for multiple industries. PLC, HMI and SCADA/DCS systems with historical data logging and smart analytical tools to schedule preventive maintenance.
